item.title: CVE-2024-2001|2024-02-29T13:30:54.169Z -- Cockpit CMS -- Cockpit CMS
item.description: A Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in Cockpit CMS affecting version 2.7.0. This vulnerability could allow an authenticated user to upload an infected PDF file and store a malicious JavaScript payload to be executed when the file is uploaded.
